title: Supports explain to me plez.
body:
How in the world can you last hit greatly 


**_THIS IS A JOKE_**

replies.body:
You get a relic shield and spend 5 minutes explaining to your ADC how relic shield works, then when they call you a noob, then you use your highest-damage ability to secure kills on each cannon minion. 

They will cry, call you a troll, and benefit from the gold share.

Simple.  You just mindless click around waiting for something to happen from the other team and you'll be 8/min in no time!

You'll even improve your KDA with this tactic!

Ignore your adcs caution pings. he's just jelly of your skill.
